posts.content:
Hi guys.

I'll shortly be having my gearbox out and,after speaking to Paul from Bears, I'm wanting to replace all the bushes.

It seems that there's 2 types of gear linkage set ups - see diagram - mine is the one on the bottom.

I'm going to need the 19 I think.

What's the part number and where can I get it from? Gfs doesn't seem to stock them.

Also I'm pretty sure I've lost the little pin that goes through the ball at the o
Bottom of the gear stick, any idea where I could get one ?

Apart from a couple of the shuttlecock bushes for three rods, is there anything else I need to make changing gear smoother.
Thanks

Jason

[/quote]

mark-s wrote: http://www.alanhschofield.com/ourparts/ ... Parts.html
I was up North today and dropped in on "Mr Schofield"

I met Brian who helped me with the parts I needed, and some advice also some directions home to avoid the traffic.

Top bloke and a credit to the company.

Thanks guys.

All the parts I need to get the leaky gearbox and somtimes wonky gear selection sorted, plus some other bits.

Jason
